# Chapter 3: Understanding URDF for Humanoids — Content Implementation Tasks

**Generated by:** chapter-planner v2.0.0
**Source Plan:** chapter-03-plan.md
**Created:** 2025-12-16
**Status:** Ready for content-implementer

---

## Implementation Overview

This document provides the content-implementer with a complete checklist for creating Chapter 3 lesson materials. Focus: URDF XML, robot modeling, geometric properties, visualization.

**Total Estimated Effort:** 110 hours across 4 phases

---

## Lesson 1: URDF Fundamentals and Single Link

### Lesson File
- [ ] Create `01-lesson-1.md` with URDF basics

### Code Examples
- [ ] Create `minimal_link.urdf` — single box link
  - 1m × 1m × 0.5m dimensions
  - Visual geometry defined
  - Tests: check_urdf validation

### Diagrams
- [ ] "URDF XML Structure" — elements and nesting
- [ ] "Single Link Anatomy" — visual, origin, geometry

### Exercises
- [ ] 3.1a: Create minimal URDF manually
  - Solution: `solutions/03-lesson-1-exercise-1a.urdf`
- [ ] 3.1b: Visualize in RViz
  - Guide: `solutions/03-lesson-1-exercise-1b.md`
- [ ] 3.1c: Modify geometry dimensions
  - Solution: `solutions/03-lesson-1-exercise-1c.urdf`

### Success Criteria
- [ ] Lesson file comprehensive
- [ ] All code examples work
- [ ] URDF validation clear
- [ ] RViz visualization instructions included

  - Solution key: `solutions/03-lesson-4-exercise-1a-answer.md`
- [ ] 3.4b: Cylinder inertia
  - Worksheet: `solutions/03-lesson-4-exercise-1b.pdf`
- [ ] 3.4c: Sphere inertia
  - Worksheet: `solutions/03-lesson-4-exercise-1c.pdf`
- [ ] 3.4d: Apply to URDF

- [ ] 3.4e: AI-guided validation
  - Scenario: `solutions/03-lesson-4-exercise-1e.md`

### Tools
- [ ] Create Python inertia calculator script
  - Input: shape type, dimensions, mass
  - Output: Ixx, Iyy, Izz values
  - Filename: `tools/inertia_calculator.py`

## Lesson 8: Capstone — Complete Humanoid Upper Body

### Specification
- [ ] Create `capstone-specification.md`
  - Detailed requirements
  - Success criteria checklist
  - Dimension specifications

### Code Examples
- [ ] Solution implementation:
  - `capstone_humanoid_upper_body.xacro` (using macros)
  - `capstone_humanoid_upper_body.urdf` (expanded URDF)

### Step-by-Step Guide
- [ ] Implementation walkthrough document
  - Phase 1: Torso and head
  - Phase 2: Left arm
  - Phase 3: Right arm
  - Phase 4: Inertial properties
  - Phase 5: Validation

### Exercises
- [ ] 3.8a: Design architecture

- [ ] 3.8b: Implement torso and head
  - Solution: `solutions/03-capstone-exercise-1b.xacro`
- [ ] 3.8c: Implement left arm
  - Solution: `solutions/03-capstone-exercise-1c.xacro`
- [ ] 3.8d: Implement right arm
  - Solution: `solutions/03-capstone-exercise-1d.xacro`
- [ ] 3.8e: Add inertial properties
  - Worksheet: `solutions/03-capstone-exercise-1e.md`
  - Solution: `solutions/03-capstone-exercise-1e.xacro`
- [ ] 3.8f: Final validation
  - Checklist: `solutions/03-capstone-exercise-1f-checklist.md`

### Tools/Utilities
- [ ] Launch file for visualizing capstone model
  - `tools/launch_humanoid.launch.py`

## Supporting Materials

### Reference Documents
- [ ] `urdf-syntax-reference.md` — Complete XML syntax guide
- [ ] `geometry-types-reference.md` — Box, cylinder, sphere, mesh
- [ ] `inertia-formulas-reference.md` — All shape formulas
- [ ] `joint-types-reference.md` — Joint configuration options
- [ ] `xacro-macros-guide.md` — Macro syntax and examples

### Tools and Utilities
- [ ] Python inertia calculator
- [ ] URDF validator script (wrapper for check_urdf)
- [ ] RViz configuration templates
- [ ] Dimension conversion utilities

### Troubleshooting Guides
- [ ] `urdf-syntax-errors.md` — Common XML mistakes
- [ ] `visualization-issues.md` — RViz loading problems
- [ ] `joint-issues.md` — Joint behavior problems
- [ ] `inertia-issues.md` — Inertia-related simulation problems

### Knowledge Checks
- [ ] Chapter-level quiz (15 questions)
  - URDF syntax
  - Link properties
  - Joint configuration
  - Inertia calculations
  - Transform frames
- [ ] Solution key: `chapter-03-quiz-answers.md`

## File Organization Summary

```
specs/book/part-1/
├── chapter-03-plan.md
├── chapter-03-tasks.md
└── content/
    ├── 01-lesson-1.md
    ├── 02-lesson-2.md
    ├── 03-lesson-3.md
    ├── 04-lesson-4.md
    ├── 05-lesson-5.md
    ├── 06-lesson-6.md
    ├── 07-lesson-7.md
    ├── 08-lesson-8.md
    ├── diagrams/
    │   ├── urdf-structure.png
    │   ├── single-link-anatomy.png
    │   ├── three-geometries.png
    │   ├── inertia-matrix.png
    │   ├── joint-types.png
    │   ├── two-link-structure.png
    │   ├── transform-tree.png
    │   ├── arm-structure.png
    │   └── humanoid-upper-body.png
    ├── code-examples/
    │   ├── 01_single_link/
    │   ├── 02_link_properties/
    │   ├── 03_joints/
    │   ├── 04_inertia/
    │   ├── 05_transform_frames/
    │   ├── 06_articulated_arm/
    │   ├── 07_macros/
    │   └── 08_capstone/
    ├── solutions/
    │   ├── 01-lesson-1-exercise-*.urdf
    │   ├── 02-lesson-2-exercise-*.urdf
    │   └── ... (all exercise solutions)
    ├── tools/
    │   ├── inertia_calculator.py
    │   ├── urdf_validator.py
    │   ├── launch_humanoid.launch.py
    │   └── humanoid_rviz.rviz
    ├── worksheets/
    │   ├── 03-lesson-4-exercise-1a.pdf
    │   ├── 03-lesson-4-exercise-1b.pdf
    │   └── ... (calculation worksheets)
    └── references/
        ├── urdf-syntax-reference.md
        ├── geometry-types-reference.md
        ├── inertia-formulas-reference.md
        ├── joint-types-reference.md
        ├── xacro-macros-guide.md
        └── chapter-03-quiz-answers.md
```

---

## Implementation Priority & Timeline

**Phase 1: Foundations (Lessons 3.1-3.2)**
- Priority: CRITICAL
- Effort: 25 hours
- Includes: Single link, properties, URDF basics

**Phase 2: Articulation (Lessons 3.3-3.5)**
- Priority: HIGH
- Effort: 30 hours
- Includes: Joints, inertia calculations, frames

**Phase 3: Building (Lessons 3.6-3.8)**
- Priority: HIGH
- Effort: 35 hours
- Includes: Articulated arm, macros, capstone

**Phase 4: Supporting Materials**
- Priority: MEDIUM
- Effort: 20 hours
- Includes: References, tools, troubleshooting

**Total Estimated Effort:** 110 hours

---

## Quality Checklist

Before marking complete:

- [ ] All lesson .md files created and proofread
- [ ] All URDF examples validated with check_urdf
- [ ] All code examples work in RViz
- [ ] All diagrams clear and embedded
- [ ] All exercises solvable in stated time
- [ ] All solutions provided
- [ ] Inertia calculations verified
- [ ] RViz launch files functional
- [ ] xacro macros work correctly
- [ ] Capstone model realistic
- [ ] All reference documents complete
- [ ] Quiz and answers provided
- [ ] Troubleshooting guides comprehensive
- [ ] Content proofread and validated
